title: L'apprenti Salaud = the Apprentice Heel
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Bien mal acquis' by Franck Neville.
description: Antoine was a pleasant and agreeable man for years, until a small inheritance begins to give him some dangerous ideas about gaining wealth and women. Partly in order to win the affections of a young woman, he becomes a small-time con man on the basis of some ideas his accountant has planted in his mind.  Credits: Producer, Philippe Dussart ; director, Michel Deville ; writer, Michel Deville ; photography, Claude Lecomte ; music, Georges Bizet. Cast: Robert Lamoureux, Christine Dejoux, Claude Pieplu, Georges Wilson, Jean-Pierre Kalfon, Jacques Doniol-Valcroze, Jean-Francois Derec, Bernard Lavalette, Annick Blancheteau.
